overview: At their school, the two 17-year-old teenagers Jannik and Tai are bullied. One evening, classical fan Jannik receives a video on which school principal Lamprecht romps through the area drunk. Jannik immediately makes his way to Tai ... - Adaptation (2023) of the novel of the same name by Axel Ranisch, for which he received the debut prize at the literature festival lit.Cologne in 2018.
